name: Datong Yisheng Coal Mine
company_mentions: Datong Coal Mining Group TONGDI Yisheng Coal Industry Co Ltd

The Datong Yisheng Coal Mine is a coal mine located in the village of Fanjiashi, in the town of Dianwan, Zuoyun County, Datong City

operators: Datong Coal Mining Group TONGDI Yisheng Coal Industry Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by a subsidiary of the Datong Coal Mining Group.
